tiles.title: Unsmoothed CU´s Utilization by Reported Time
Unsmoothed CU´s Utilization by Reported Time

queries.text:
_capacityBase
| count

let workspaces_count = _capacityOperations | summarize Workspaces=count_distinct(['Workspace Id']) by ['Capacity Id'];
_capacitySummary
| project ['Consumption %'], ['Capacity Id'], ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Sku']
| summarize ['Capacity Usage %'] = round(avg(['Consumption %']),2) by ['Capacity Id'],['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Sku']
| extend  ['Capacity Usage %'] = strcat(tostring(iff(isnan(['Capacity Usage %']),0.0,['Capacity Usage %'])),"%")
| lookup workspaces_count on ['Capacity Id']
| lookup _capacityLastSate on $left.['Capacity Id']== $right.capacityId
| project ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Id'], ['Capacity Sku'], Workspaces, ['Capacity Usage %'], ["Capacity State"]=iff(isempty( capacityState),"Active",capacityState), ["State Change Reason"]=stateChangeReason
| where Workspaces > 0
| order by Workspaces desc

_capacityBase
| summarize Capacities=count() by Sku

_capacityOperations
| summarize Workspaces=count_distinct(['Workspace Id']) by ['Capacity Sku']

_capacityOperations
| project ['Workspace Id']
| summarize Workspaces=count_distinct(['Workspace Id'])

_capacityOperations
| project ['Capacity Name'], ['Workspace Name'], ['Workspace Id'], ['CU´s'],Domain,['Parent Domain']
| summarize ['CU´s']=round(sum(['CU´s']),2) by ['Capacity Name'], ['Workspace Name'], ['Workspace Id'], Domain, ['Parent Domain']
| top 100 by ['CU´s']

_capacityOperations
| summarize Workspaces=count_distinct(['Workspace Id']) by ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Id']
| order by Workspaces

_capacityOperations
| project ['Capacity Name'], ['Workspace Name'], ['Workspace Id'], ['CU´s'],Domain,['Parent Domain']
| summarize ['CU´s']=round(sum(['CU´s']),2) by ['Workspace Name'], ['Workspace Id']
| top 10 by ['CU´s']

_capacityOperations
| summarize CapacityUnitsSeconds=sum(['CU´s']) by ['Operation Name']

let _timespan = case(
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(730d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(365d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(60d), timespan(6h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(14d), timespan(1h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(1d), timespan(30m),
    timespan(30s)
);
_capacitySummary
| project ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Useage %'] = round((['Consumption %']), 2), ['Window Time']=['Window Start Time'], ['Capacity Id']
| make-series ['Capacity Useage %']=avg(['Capacity Useage %']) on ['Window Time'] step _timespan by ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Id']

_capacityBase
| project CapacityName,CapacityId, Capacity=1

_capacityOperations
| project ['Workspace Id']
| summarize Workspaces=count_distinct(['Workspace Id'])

_capacitySummary
| project ['Consumption %']
| summarize ['Capacity Usage %'] = round(avg(['Consumption %']),2)
| project strcat(tostring(iff(isnan(['Capacity Usage %']),0.0,['Capacity Usage %'])),"%")

_capacityOperations
| project ['Item Id']
| summarize Workspaces=count_distinct(['Item Id'])

_capacityOperations
| where ['Workspace Id'] in (_workspaceNameExact)
| project ['Workspace Name']
| take 1

_capacityOperations
| project ['CU´s'], ['Item'] = strcat(['Item Name'], " - ", ['Item Kind']), ['Workspace Id'], ['Item Id']
| summarize ['CU´s']=round(sum(['CU´s']),2) by Item, ['Workspace Id'], ['Item Id']
| top 10 by ['CU´s']

_capacityOperations
| summarize CapacityUnitsSeconds=sum(['CU´s']) by ['Operation Name']

let _timespan = case(
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(730d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(365d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(60d), timespan(6h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(14d), timespan(1h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(1d), timespan(30m),
    timespan(30s)
);
_capacityOperations
| extend ['CU´s']=['CU´s'], ['Capacity Name'], ['Time']
| make-series ['CU´s']=sum(['CU´s']) on ['Time'] step _timespan by ['Capacity Name'], ['Utilization Type']

_capacityOperations
| project ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Id'], ['Capacity Sku'],['Workspace Name'],['Workspace Id'], ['Item Name'], ['Item Id'], ['Item Kind'], ['Operation Name'],
['CU´s'],['Operation Start Time'], ['Reported Time'] = Time, ['Duration Ms'], ['Window Start Time'], ['Window End Time'],
Timepoints, ['Timepoint CU']

_capacityOperations
| summarize round(sum(['CU´s']),2)

_capacityOperations
| count

_capacityOperations
| summarize Operations=count() by ['Utilization Type'], ['Workspace Name']
| take 1

let _timespan = case(
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(730d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(365d), timespan(1d),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(60d), timespan(6h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(14d), timespan(1h),
    _endTime - _startTime >= timespan(1d), timespan(30m),
    timespan(30s)
);
_capacitySummary
| project ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Useage %'] = round((['Consumption %']), 2), ['Window Time']=['Window Start Time'], ['Capacity Id']
| make-series ['Capacity Useage %']=avg(['Capacity Useage %']) on ['Window Time'] step _timespan by ['Capacity Name'], ['Capacity Id']

_capacitySummary
| project ['Consumption %']
| summarize ['Capacity Usage %'] = round(avg(['Consumption %']),2)
| project strcat(tostring(iff(isnan(['Capacity Usage %']),0.0,['Capacity Usage %'])),"%")

CapacitySummary
| where capacitySku in (_capacityType)
| distinct CapacityId=capacityId,CapacityName=capacityName,Sku=capacitySku
| project CapacityId, CapacityName, Sku

CapacitySummary
| where windowStartTime between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where capacityId in (_capacityBase)
| lookup _capacityBase on  $left.capacityId ==  $right.CapacityId
| project ['Capacity Id'] = capacityId,
['Capacity Name'] = CapacityName,
['Capacity Sku'] = capacitySku,
['CU´s'] = capacityUnitMs/1000.0,
['Consumption %'] = 100*(capacityUnitMs/1000.0)/timepointCapacityUnits,
['Window Start Time'] = windowStartTime,
['Window End Time'] = windowEndTime,
['Timepoint Base CU']=timepointCapacityUnits,
['Base CU']=baseCapacityUnits

CapacityOperations
| where ['time'] between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where capacityId in (_capacities)
| where workspaceId in (_workspaceNameExact)
| where itemId in (_item)
| lookup _capacityBase on $left.capacityId == $right.CapacityId
| project ['Capacity Name'] = CapacityName,
['Capacity Id'] = capacityId,
['Capacity Sku'] =capacitySku,
['Workspace Name'] = workspaceName,
['Workspace Id'] = workspaceId,
['CU´s'] = capacityUnitMs/1000.0,
['Domain'] = workspaceDomain,
['Domain Id'] = workspaceDomainId,
['Parent Domain'] = workspaceParentDomain,
['Parent Domain Id'] = workspaceParentDomainId,
['Window Start Time'] = windowStartTime,
['Window End Time'] = windowEndTime,
['Time']=['time'],
['Operation Name'] = operationName,
['Item Name'] = itemName,
['Item Id'] = itemId,
['Item Kind'] = itemKind,
['Timepoints'] = (windowEndTime - windowStartTime) /30s,
['Timepoint CU'] = (capacityUnitMs/1000.0)/((windowEndTime - windowStartTime)/30s),
['Utilization Type']=utilizationType,
['Operation Start Time'] = operationStartTime,
['Duration Ms'] = durationMs

CapacityState
| summarize arg_max(transitionTime,capacityState,stateChangeReason) by capacityId

CapacitySummary
| distinct capacitySku

_capacityBase
| project CapacityId, CapacityName

CapacityOperations
| where ['time'] between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where workspaceName contains _workspaceNameSearch
| where capacityId in (_capacities)
| distinct workspaceId,workspaceName
| take 1000

CapacityOperations
| where windowStartTime  between (_startTime .. _endTime)
| where capacityId in (_capacities)
| where workspaceId in (_workspaceNameExact)
| project 
['Workspace Id'] = workspaceId,
['Operation Name'] = operationName,
['Item Name'] = itemName,
['Item Id'] = itemId,
['Item Kind'] = itemKind
| summarize by ['Item Id'], ['Item'] = strcat(['Item Name']," - ", ['Item Kind']), ['Workspace Id']
